query: SELECT u.id, u.credits, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents WHERE userId = u.id AND source = 'email') as email_docs FROM users u WHERE u.forwardingEmail LIKE '%mesjywq4%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3cm1rAYqFTLZz8b.ead05c4c62f7 --database jxNutJmZj7bf8VEqqERusH --execute SELECT u.id, u.credits, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents WHERE userId = u.id AND source = 'email') as email_docs FROM users u WHERE u.forwardingEmail LIKE '%mesjywq4%';
